Precise BioMatch FLEX-H Toolkit Documentation
BM_Image Members
BM_Image Class  Methods  Properties  See Also  Send Feedback
Precise BioMatch FLEX-H Toolkit 1.4.0

The BM_Image type exposes the following members.

Methods

  NameDescription
ToEncodingString
A function for returning the String representation of the encoding used by the image in question.
ToImage
A method for converting an internal image format object into a display compatible image.

Properties

  NameDescription
BioEnabled
Flag that signals the validity of the image for biometric enrolment and verification purposes.
Encoding
The pixel format encoding used in the bitmap image.
Finger
The finger represented in the template if known.
Height
Height of the image bitmap display area in pixels.
HeightDPI
Resolution in Dots Per Inch (DPI) on the vertical image axis.
RawData
The image bitmap.
Sensor
The BioMatch compatible sensor used to capture the image if known.
Stride
Width of each image bitmap scanline >= display area width in pixels. Note that this value should always be divisible by 4 for Windows display.
Width
Width of the image bitmap display area in pixels.
WidthDPI
Resolution in Dots Per Inch (DPI) on the horizontal image axis.

See Also

BM_Image Class
PreciseBiometrics.BMFH Namespace
